ambition.question: Did your pursuit of leadership roles, career advancement, and personal goals lead you to prioritize power and control over humility, service, and respect for others?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence my relationships and interactions with others, potentially leading me to prioritize my own interests over their well-being?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the many blessings in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I allowed feelings of discontent for my own life to lead me to secretly wish others would lose their blessings, rather than rejoicing in their good fortune?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, thereby dishonoring their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with impolite words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, especially when it could have impacted your ability to fulfill your duties or responsibilities?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: to overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I allow my desire for comfort and enjoyment to lead me to overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, neglecting the need for moderation?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources for leisure activities over meeting my important obligations?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs or faults
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs or faults, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I spoken about others' private affairs for my own pleasure, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I shared others' private affairs with someone else, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you engage in unnecessary work on a Sunday, disregarding its significance as a day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeking reconciliation with those I feel
anger.question: Have I nursed anger in my heart, rather than seeking reconciliation with those I feel has wronged me?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
